Paper.Title: and DISCO -- An HPSG-based NLP System its Application for Appointment Scheduling -- Project Note --

Section.Paragraph: The natural language system DISC() is described. It combines a powerful and flexible grammar development system; * linguistic competence for German including morphology, syntax and semantics; * new metlmds for linguistic performance modelling on the basis of high-level competence grammars; * new methods for modelling multi-agent dialogue competence; null * an interesting sample application for appointment scheduling and calendar management.
